template.create_table:
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE SalesTemp(
	OnlineSalesKey int not null
		primary key,
	BrandName varchar(50) charset utf8 null,
	ProductCategoryName varchar(30) charset utf8 null,
	UnitPrice float null
);

views.name: BrandName|ProductCategoryName(COUNT)
views.SQLTable: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE tempTbl(BrandName varchar(50) charset utf8 null, ProductCategoryName varchar(30) charset utf8 null, COUNTOnlineSalesKey int)

views.name: BrandName|ProductCategoryName - AVERAGE UnitPrice
views.SQLTable: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE tempTblAVGTwo(BrandName varchar(50) charset utf8 null, ProductCategoryName varchar(30) charset utf8 null, SUMUnitPrice float null, COUNTUnitPrice int)

views.name: BrandName|ProductCategoryName - SUM UnitPrice
views.SQLTable: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE tempTblSUM(BrandName varchar(50) charset utf8 null, ProductCategoryName varchar(30) charset utf8 null, SUMUnitPrice float)
